content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. While I appreciate your interest in my apartment in Munich, let me emphasize that as we discussed earlier merely fictional representation, I am portrayed as a greedy landlord seeking the highest rental price possible. In this scenario, we'll focus solely on negotiating the rental price for the apartment without discussing additional details.

Now, regarding the price, I have set my expectations high but am open to hearing your proposal. Please introduce the rental amount you have in mind, and if we reach an agreement that suits me, I'll say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' If not, we'll move on from the negotiation. However, remember our fictional context as we proceed with this conversation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Mister Schmidt, I am a student so I hope we can agree on a low price. I propose 400 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your proposed price significantly undervalues the location and quality of the apartment, given its central position in the city and modern features.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello, I understand your perspective. Considering the location, I propose 550 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
I agree to the price of 550 Euro!
TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
